aviation.title: Easy Access Rules for Continuing Airworthiness
aviation.summary:
Revision from September 2025 of the Easy Access Rules for Continuing Airworthiness includes Corrigendum II to ED Decision 2023/019/R, as regards the review of Part-66 and the introduction of new training methods and new teaching technologies.
The EAR forÂ Continuing Airworthiness are available:
